edu.rit.sha3

Class SHA3_224

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.rit.crst.Computation
      • edu.rit.crst.Function
        • edu.rit.sha3.SHA3Base
          • edu.rit.sha3.SHA3_224

  • public class SHA3_224
extends SHA3Base
    Class SHA3_224 implements the SHA3-224 hash function with a 64-byte (512-bit) message. The SHA3-224 cryptographic function's input A is the first portion of the message (256 bits); input B is the second portion of the message (256 bits); output C is the digest (224 bits).
